name: Tinger Converter
short_description: This soft can convert all kinds of audios and videos to MP3 formate. She can run on any kinds of platform, like windows, linux, MAC, etc. Especially she is better at multi-tasks. The audio like mp3, wma, etc. The video like rmvb, rmvb, avi, mkv, etc.
